topics.title: Lock your profile
topics.summary: Stop strangers from seeing more than the basics of your profile.

steps.text: Tap your profile picture or name to open your profile.
Tap the three dots → Tap Lock profile.
Review the summary then tap Lock your profile.

topics.notes: Lock profile keeps future posts limited to friends but does not change past public posts.

topics.title: Review who can see your posts
topics.summary: Make sure only the right audience can see what you share.

steps.text: Open Facebook → tap Menu → Settings & privacy → Privacy shortcuts.
Under Your Activity, tap Who can see your future posts?
Choose Friends (recommended) or a custom list.
Tap Limit who can see past posts → Confirm.

topics.notes: Limiting past posts is permanent. Download anything important first.

topics.title: Enable two-factor authentication
topics.summary: Add a second step when you log in so attackers can’t reuse your password.

steps.text: Open Facebook → tap Menu → Settings & privacy → Settings.
Tap Accounts Center → Password and security.
Pick an authenticator app (recommended) or SMS and follow the prompts.

topics.notes: Authenticator apps are safer than SMS. Write down backup codes and store them safely.

topics.title: Remove risky apps
topics.summary: Disconnect games and websites that you no longer trust.

steps.text: Open Facebook → tap Menu → Settings & privacy → Settings.
Tap the app you want to remove → Tap Remove.
Confirm by tapping Remove again and check Delete posts box if needed.

topics.notes: Removing an app does not delete what you shared inside that app. Visit the app to delete data.
